mapper.select: SELECT RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(b.score_change) DESC) AS ranking, a.nickname, a.profile_img, SUM(b.score_change) AS point_code, COALESCE(d.crew_name, 'No Crew') AS crew_name FROM user_tbl a JOIN record_tbl b ON a.usercode = b.usercode LEFT JOIN crew_member_tbl c ON a.usercode = c.usercode LEFT JOIN create_crew_tbl d ON c.create_crew_code = d.create_crew_code WHERE a.is_info_disclosure = 'Y' GROUP BY a.usercode, a.nickname, a.profile_img, d.crew_name ORDER BY ranking LIMIT 5;

SELECT RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(b.score_change) DESC) AS ranking, a.nickname, a.profile_img, SUM(b.score_change) AS point_code, COALESCE(d.crew_name, 'No Crew') AS crew_name FROM user_tbl a LEFT JOIN record_tbl b ON a.usercode = b.usercode LEFT JOIN crew_member_tbl c ON a.usercode = c.usercode LEFT JOIN create_crew_tbl d ON c.create_crew_code = d.create_crew_code GROUP BY a.usercode, a.nickname, a.profile_img, d.crew_name LIMIT 5 OFFSET ${param1};

select a.marathon_code, a.marathon_name from marathon_list_tbl a, cart_tbl b, order_tbl c, payment_tbl d where d.order_code = c.order_code and c.cart_code = b.cart_code and b.marathon_code =a.marathon_code and b.usercode =${param1} and a.marathon_code not in (select a.marathon_code from marathon_list_tbl a, matching_room_tbl b, applicant_tbl c where a.marathon_code = b.marathon_no and b.matching_room_code = c.matching_room_code and c.usercode = ${param1} and c.is_Completion = 1);
select usercode from user_tbl where username ='${param1}'

select coalesce( (select matching_room_code from matching_room_tbl where marathon_no = ${param1} and marathon_count = '${param2}' and max_personnel > now_personnel and max_personnel = ${param3} limit 1), 0) from dual order by rand() limit 1;
select coalesce( (select matching_room_code from applicant_tbl where usercode = ${param1} and is_Completion = 0 limit 1), 0) from dual limit 1;

SELECT b.gender, b.nickname, SUM(c.score_change) AS tbuf_n, COALESCE(e.crew_name, 'No Crew') AS crew_name, f.max_personnel AS buff_n, a.accept_yn AS a_s, f.now_personnel AS update_cnt, b.usercode, a.profile AS b_s, b.birthdate, a.profile, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM applicant_tbl WHERE accept_yn = 'Y' AND matching_room_code = f.matching_room_code) AS accept_cnt FROM applicant_tbl a JOIN user_tbl b ON a.usercode = b.usercode LEFT JOIN record_tbl c ON b.usercode = c.usercode LEFT JOIN crew_member_tbl d ON a.usercode = d.usercode LEFT JOIN create_crew_tbl e ON d.create_crew_code = e.create_crew_code LEFT JOIN matching_room_tbl f ON a.matching_room_code = f.matching_room_code WHERE a.matching_room_code = ${param1} GROUP BY b.gender, b.nickname, e.crew_name, f.max_personnel, a.applicant_code, a.accept_yn, f.now_personnel ORDER BY a.applicant_code;
mapper.update: update matching_room_tbl set now_personnel=now_personnel+1 where matching_room_code=${param1}
update matching_room_tbl set now_personnel=now_personnel-1 where matching_room_code=${param1}
update applicant_tbl set profile=${param1} where usercode=${param2}
update applicant_tbl set is_Completion=1 where matching_room_code=${param1}
